ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Very slow after DirectX 9 patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed that dx9 isn t so great. I was getting used to things with the previous version. I have a GeForce Ti 4600 vid card, 1GB of RAM, 1.4GHz
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed that dx9 isn't so great. I was getting used to things with the previous version. I have a GeForce Ti 4600 vid card, 1GB of RAM, 1.4GHz processor... and I keep lagging really badly, have lousy framerate, and zonecrash alot more. I also can't target corpses. Even with /tar it isn't working all the time. which sucks for a cleric trying to rez. It's extremely frustrating. I hope they fix this soon. Oh, and all that is with particle effects off, clip plane set low, and most luclin models off.
-Su

directx 9 can eat my @$$ it sucks so bad my computer is so slow now its
not even funny like i used to be able to move in pok and now it blows
